channel.title: Auto killer idea with a twist...plz read!
channel.description: okay, heres the idea, an auto white knight killer with a twist, no food, instead, you put on only 3 items and have ur respawn set to falador (recruitment drive quest)which means that you will respawn in the middle of the whight knights, so it should be made to attack them and then re equipt ur items when you die, but it needs 2 things 1.anti randoms (big one!) 2.anti ban( ... would make it popular...) preferably free... it would prob get u tons of rep... if you need a price, make it rs cash and plz nothing rediculous... oh and a future idea... if the whight knights drop anything... an auto pickup/bank on the items and auto bone bury? ... poonage idea if script lives... if you read this plz post even if you dont know how to help, at least keep this bumped...[br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2007, 12:38:24 AM[/size][hr]almost forgot!!! this script is useless without anti randoms!( the ones that tele u and the genie... he scatters ur items) big one still....[br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2007, 12:40:04 AM[/size][hr]i see u ppl viewing and not posing plz post ur opinion im DEAD SERIOUS!!!

item.title: Auto killer idea with a twist...plz read!
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

White knight castle is the castle in falador, it has white knights in it.
It would have to be members, because changing respawn only works on members worlds.
You don’t need much fighting for the script, you need to turn into a woman at one point though, for the fighting and you cannot bring weapons.
A lot of people in runescape have done this quest since its quite easy

Read full topic
item.source: Auto killer idea with a twist...plz read!

item.title: Auto killer idea with a twist...plz read!
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

I have a few questions.

Where is the white knight castle?
Would this be a f2p or members script?
and
What is the average lvl of people who can beat that quest, and approximately what percentage of Runescape players have completed it?

With those answered, I might just make a script for it. From what you wrote, it sounds like a good idea.

Read full topic

okay, heres the idea, an auto white knight killer with a twist, no food,
instead, you put on only 3 items and have ur respawn set to falador (recruitment drive quest)which means that you will respawn in the middle of the whight knights, so it should be made to attack them and then re equipt ur items when you die, but it needs 2 things
1.anti randoms (big one!)
2.anti ban( … would make it popular…)
preferably free… it would prob get u tons of rep… if you need a price, make it rs cash and plz nothing rediculous…
oh and a future idea… if the whight knights drop anything… an auto pickup/bank on the items and
